item.title: Visualizations in R
item.description: Here you will find some interesting and cool visualizations that I’ve made using the ggplot2 library. Before producing the plots, the datasets had to be cleaned and manipulated. I used various packages such as lubridate to clean dates, and dplyr. Github Video game sales Halloween horror movies

item.title: Machine Learning: Survival on the Titanic
item.description: Created a Machine Learning model to predict survival outcomes of passengers Cleaned the data using Pandas; imputed missing values, created dummy variables Engineered features such as whether the passenger was onboard alone Used scikit-learn to develop models for prediction (RandomForests, DecisionTrees, K Neighbours etc.) The github repository: https://github.com/entekang/Titanic_ML The kaggle notebook: https://www.kaggle.com/entekang/titanic
